liar_game_data.question: In Korean business culture, what is the proper way to receive a business card (명함) from a superior?
options: Take it with one hand and put it in your pocket immediately
Receive it with both hands, read it carefully, then place it on the table
Receive it with your left hand only
Fold it and put it in your wallet right away
liar_game_data.explanation: In Korean business culture, you must receive a business card with both hands as a sign of respect. After receiving it, you should read it carefully to show interest and respect for the person's position. Then, place it on the table in front of you during the meeting. Never put it away immediately or write on it, as this is considered disrespectful.
